description:
Luffy`s friends are shocked to learn that his grandpa is a marine hero, but that`s nothing compared to how surprised they`ll be by his father`s true identity!
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: La plus puissante des familles ? Révélations sur le père de Luffy !
Saikyou no Kakei? Akasareta Luffy no Chichi!
The Strongest Family? Luffy`s Father Revealed!
العائلة الأقوى؟ الكشف عن أب لوفي!
最強の家系? 明かされたルフィの父!
